name: Introduction to Sociology
description: This course will provide an introduction to the concepts, theories, and research methods used in the field of sociology.

name: Social Theory
description: This course examines the major social theories of the 19th and 20th centuries, with a focus on the works of early sociologists.

name: Research Methods in Sociology
description: This course examines quantitative and qualitative research methods in sociology, and introduces students to the design, implementation, and analysis of research projects.

name: Sociology of Migration
description: This course introduces students to the history and current trends of migration, the impact of migration on host countries, and the adaptation processes of migrants.
